text: Advertisement The 69th Emmy Awards kicked off in Los Angeles with a glitzy red carpet on Sunday evening. Sofia Vergara led the fashionable pack at this year's award show in a strapless white dress, with her ample cleavage and hourglass curves on full display. The Sinner star Jessica Biel, supermodel Heidi Klum and actress Nicole Kidman also stepped on the carpet at Microsoft Theater on Sunday in plunging looks, all choosing breathtaking gowns with revealing necklines.
